name: SURVIVAL SISTERS:2048
description:
In a devastated world, sisters who have returned from the depths of despair grow the sustenance they need to live today...

Game Flow

One day passes with each slide, and a new object appears.
The three types of objects that appear are dirt, sisters, and zombies at random.
Bombs can make the objects disappear, and by this way zombies can be defeated.
The number of food will increase when vegetables are harvested by continuing to mix soil, and the population will increase with the number of food.
The number of days of survival when the population reaches 0 is the game's play score.

Survive and defeat the looming threat and countless zombies!

Features

  • Easy to Use Slide Puzzle!
  • Evolution By Merging the Same Image!
  • Harvest the Vegetables You've Grown!
  • If A Sister Appears, You Have A Chance!
  • Zombies Eat other Objects.
  • Zombies Blow Up With Bombs!
  • Fever Can Occur Depending On the Conditions...!
  • Simple, But Endless Fun!


Survive by making full use of bombs. However, the rate of zombies increases with each zombie rush.

Graphic

Survive in a post-apocalyptic world with cute characters and adorable vegetables!
